0.text: Innate- Shard of the Monolith: Malphite gains increased percentage size equal to 8% of his total armor, capped at 35% increased size at 437.5 armor.

1.text:
Innate: Malphite  shields himself for  10% of his maximum health.
The shield lasts until it is broken, and refreshes if he has not taken damage in the last few seconds.

0.text: Active: Malphite sends a rock rolling to the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and  slowing them for 3 seconds upon arrival.

1.text: Malphite also gains  bonus movement speed equal to the raw amount the target lost from the slow for the duration.

0.text: Passive: Malphite gains  bonus armor, tripled while  Granite Shield is active.

1.text: Active: Malphite's next  basic attack within 6 seconds is empowered to gain  50 bonus range and deal  bonus physical damage  on-hit.

2.text: Additionally, Malphite's basic attacks  on-hit for the next 5 seconds trigger a cone in the direction of the target, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

3.text: Thunderclap  resets Malphite's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Malphite slams the ground beneath him, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and  crippling them for 3 seconds.
Active: Malphite  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target location and, upon impact, deals magic damage to all nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Unstoppable Force will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

1.originHTML: +  350

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+350 health
+25 armor
+25 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters.
Unique – Snowbind: Basic attacks create a 250 unit radius frost field that slows enemies within by ( 25% / 12.5%) (+ ( 4% / 2%) per 1000 maximum health) for 1.5 seconds (( 4 / 6) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 100 bonus health and 6% increased size.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 60%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

Active

Unique – Monolith: Gain a shield for 100 (+ 100% bonus health), decaying over 2.5 seconds, and +25% increased size while active (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Fortify: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FORTIFY: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.

active.originText: UNIQUE – HUMILITY: Unleash a shockwave around you that  slows nearby enemies by 99% for 0.25 seconds and reduces their attack damage by 10% and critical strike damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive
